outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to establish facilities to allow UNDP projects and others engaged in biodiversity mainstreaming endeavours to exchange, adopt and apply information concerning experiences and good practices. Outputs will include:
•	Primers providing decision-makers with a framework of analysis to define the costs, benefits and tradeoffs inherent in pursuing production in areas of high biodiversity facilitate informed decision making:
•	A set of decision making tools for supply chain transformation, to simultaneously address biodiversity management and economic development imperatives, building on on-going UNDP work.
•	Partnership engineered with the CBD Secretariat to mainstream biodiversity into UNDP's broader development programming.

project_descr: Biodiversity Global Programme 2008  2013:  Mainstreaming Biodiversity into Economic Sector Governance Systems and Product Supply Chains
project_title: EEG BD PIMS 4238 GLOPrg. Mainstr BD Mgt into Econom Sect
